title: Eboni K. Williams on 'Beyond the Edge,' 'Housewives,' and Coming Back
description:
Juliet Litman is joined by Eboni K. Williams to discuss all things Real Housewives and her new show on CBS, 'Beyond the Edge.' Eboni discusses the ins and outs of reality TV and why she was "built for this."
Host: Juliet Litman
Guest: Eboni K. Williams
Senior Producer: Steve Ahlman
Additional Production: Chelsea Stark-Jones
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
